entry.title: My new theme for Focuswriter got me﻿ typing
entry.summary: Typing with the sound, background and the font of a typewriter!

entry.title: Back, in style
entry.summary: It’s been a while since I practiced free writing. And not-so-coincidentally It’s been the same while since my last exam. The struggle is real people!

entry.title: Backing up your entire Google account data
entry.summary:
Today I Learned Google provides users a simple way to archive and download all of their data on Google. Including Gmail and Drive.
Few days ago someone approached me with a problem, “My Gmail ran out of space and I need all my emails, they contain important data.”
